LanguageData.RK_ThiefTunnel.label: ratkin hole
LanguageData.RK_ThiefTunnel.description: It's a Ratkin hole. It seems to someone with a small body cut a hole in the wall to come in and out.
LanguageData.RK_GuerrillaTunnel.label: drill tunnel
LanguageData.RK_GuerrillaTunnel.description: It's a drilled transport pod. A powerful mining drill was used to create a pod that moved to the ground.
LanguageData.RK_GuerrillaTunnelSpawner.label: an tremor center
LanguageData.RK_ThiefTunnelSpawner.label: ratkin tunnel
LanguageData.RK_EmpBomb.label: EMP Bomb
LanguageData.RK_EmpBomb.description: It's an EMP bomb. The only way to prevent an explosion is by directly destroying or deconstructing it.
LanguageData.MinifiedEMP.label: minified EMP
